casebody.data:
Whitacre-Greer Fireproofing Company, Appellee, v. M. P. O’Connor Company, Appellant.

[Cite as Whitacre-Greer Fireproofing Co. v. M. P. O’Connor Co. (1988), 39 Ohio St. 3d 195.]

(No. 87-63 — Submitted September 20, 1988 — Decided October 26, 1988.) Gerald L. Baker, for appellee. Vogelgesang, Howes, Lindamood & Brunn and Philip E. Howes, for appellant. Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.'
